title: Next Life - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Caring Protagonist   Cohabitation   Demon Lord   Demons   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   First-time Interc**rse   Game Elements   Goddesses   Godly Powers   Gods   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Monster Tamer   Monsters   Older Love Interests   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Reverse R*pe   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Strong to Stronger   Succubus   Transported into a Game World   Transported to Another World
author: Aino Jin   相野仁
description:
Yamada Takashi lost his life in the snowy mountains — that is what he thought, but he then appeared in an unknown place; another world that looked like the game he played. Moreover there are many things that he doesn’t know…. While puzzled, he still retains the strongest class ability and is relieved.

High rank magician, [Wise man] Marius is still living till today.>
